name: SOLOCHROMA
description:
SOLOCHROMA was created by @sad_gandalf (a 31 year old ding bat) for Epic's Unreal Mega Jam 2020. 

The game is a short survival game which features monochromatic graphics (black and white) and randomly generated levels. 

All of the songs, sounds and models & logic were created by one person during the course of 3 days. 

Enjoy!
